lines: 1. Nyasaye, gokiny mond` iwinjaKa dwonda pakoi;In e malamoi koroKating`oni wang`a.
2. Ageno Kristo ma Jawar,Masayo ni joge;Onyiso Wuoro e polo,Yuakwa gi wendewa.
3. Muche mondo taya pileE yorene maler;Onyisa tich moneg` atim,Atim gi chuny maler.
4. Jo moheri kendo luori,Nichopi dwarogi;Nyasaye maduong` oritogi,Gineno ng`wonone.
